description:
*If you are outside the LA area and travel time would be a problem, PLEASE DO NOT SUBMIT YOUR RESUME.
Import Production Coordinator A Los Angeles based Apparel Company is looking for a Import Production Coordinator. The ideal candidate must be hardworking, detail oriented, organized, a team player and work well in a fast-paced environment.
What you will do:
  • Plan coordinate and allocate shipping
  • Follow up on materials delivery (communicate with overseas & design)
  • Production planning (daily communications with vendors / overseas offices).
  • Manage WIP and T&A Calendars
  • Ensure on time production, coordinate track production of merchandise to ensure on time deliveries
What we are looking for: - Skilled professional with 3 + years import production experience - Proficient in Microsoft Office - Highly organized and able to prioritize and multi-task - Bilingual in Mandarin/Cantonese is a plus - Can speak and write fluent English
Experience:
  • Experience working in all categories: Kids, junior, missy, contemporary.
  • Private Label Experience
  • Import Production: 3 years (Required)

What you will get: Health Insurance Coverage (medical, dental and vision)
  • Paid Holidays
  • Paid Time Off
  • 401K Retirement Plan
